CLI Utility

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the driver. More...

Detailed Description

The section has a list of all the exported API which the applications need to invoke in order to use the driver.

Function Documentation

int32_t CLI_close ( void  )

Description
This is the function which is used to close the CLI module

Return values
Success- 0
Error- <0
void CLI_getMMWaveExtensionConfig ( MMWave_CtrlCfg *  ptrCtrlCfg)

Description
This is an API provided by the CLI mmWave extension handler to get the mmWave control configuration.

Parameters
[out]ptrCtrlCfgPointer to the control configuration populated by the API
Return values
Notapplicable

Parameters

Return values
